colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005B (CES GANG DU 'GRO BA'I PHYOGS KYI YUL LHA'I GSOL LHA NGO MI DO 'PHRONG BA'I DGA' STON ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, SPYIR DENG SANG YUL DUS KYI DBANG LAM SO SO'I 'DONG SBYAR GYI BSANGS SPYI SGER MTHA' YAS PA ZHIG SNANG BAS BZOD BRIS DGOS PA MI 'DUG KYANG, GCIG TU PHYOGS 'GRO LTA BUR 'DI 'TA'I  RIGS DGOS PA BYUNG TSE YI GE MANG PO ZHIG BKLAGS KYANG LAS 'BREL MED DANG, PHAL CHEN SPYIR KHYAB PA MI ZHIG LAS SHING THOGS MJUG GU LTAR GNANG THOG TU KHEL NGES SHIG MI YOD 'JUG PAS DE 'DRAR PHAN SRID SNYAM NAS, @006A *, ,^BTZUN PA DKON MCHOG BSTAN PA'I SGRON MES ZAB RGYAS MANG PO MA BSRES SHES, MING GSANG BA'I RIGS NGOR RI SKABS DON 'DRIL BAR BKOD PA'O, DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,BKRA SHIS 'BAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
